entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then rain. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. High 26. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016
